tests.requirements:
Requirement II. 11 Each of the bulk inventory mechanisms listed in Requirement II 9 shall support the ability to provide a subset of the inventory known to the target OS. The subset is defined by a filter provided by the requesting OS. The following filter shall be supported:
e. Any union of the selections in items b c and d above shall be an allowable filter condition.

testCase.response: Retrieves all the attributes of Managed Element me1 and all the contained Equipment Holders name.

postconditions.success: The requesting OS has all the requested inventory information from the target OS.
postconditions.failure: The requesting OS does not have the entire requested inventory information from the target OS.
